mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_b.product ( title, `desc`, price, coverPicture, slidePictures, detailPictures, spec, stock, status, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{desc}, #{price}, #{coverPicture}, #{slidePictures}, #{detailPictures}, #{spec}, #{stock}, #{status}, now(), NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE db_b.product SET title = #{title}, `desc` = #{desc}, price = #{price}, coverPicture = #{coverPicture}, slidePictures = #{slidePictures}, detailPictures = #{detailPictures}, spec = #{spec}, stock = #{stock}, status = #{status}, updateTime = now() WHERE product.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_b.product ORDER BY id
